typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		batchId as integer,
		state as string,
		stateFIPS as string,
		year as integer,
		dateReceived as date,
		dateReady as date,
		totalRecords as integer,
		toReview as integer,
		reviewedCount as integer,
		awaitingCount as integer,
		dthsCount as integer,
		abdtCount as integer,
		rejectedCount as integer,
		batchStatus as string,
		submittedBy as string,
		submittedDate as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		createdDate as timestamp,
		modifiedBy as string,
		modifiedDate as timestamp,
		recordId as integer,
		cpscdocnum as string,
		pdf as string,
		firstName as string,
		lastName as string,
		newage as integer,
		gender as string,
		hispanic as string,
		ethnicity as string,
		race as string,
		dod as date,
		idate as date,
		bdate as date,
		addr as string,
		rescsz as string,
		rescnty as string,
		injplace as string,
		injcsz as string,
		injcounty as string,
		dthcsz as string,
		dthcnty as string,
		work as string,
		autop as string,
		cpsc_manner as string,
		cpsc_injdesc as string,
		cpsc_cod1 as string,
		cpsc_cod2 as string,
		cpsc_cod3 as string,
		cpsc_cod4 as string,
		cpsc_othcond as string,
		product1 as string,
		bertprob1 as float,
		product2 as string,
		bertprob2 as float,
		product3 as string,
		bertprob3 as float,
		scope as string,
		scopebertprob as float,
		cpsc_cod as string,
		codprob as float,
		fireInvolved as string,
		fireprob as float,
		flag as string,
		reviewed as string,
		reviewedBy as string,
		reviewedDate as timestamp,
		reviewNotes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceCSV
SourceCSV select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> distinct
distinct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		batchId as integer,
		state as string,
		stateFIPS as string,
		year as integer,
		dateReceived as date,
		dateReady as date,
		totalRecords as integer,
		toReview as integer,
		reviewedCount as integer,
		awaitingCount as integer,
		dthsCount as integer,
		abdtCount as integer,
		rejectedCount as integer,
		batchStatus as string,
		submittedBy as string,
		submittedDate as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		createdDate as timestamp,
		modifiedBy as string,
		modifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 0,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkBatches
